div.bibl: Revyen, June 14, 1902. [HUNDRED MEN'S SOCIETIES ON SOUTH AND WEST SIDES]

body.p: About the same time as The Hundred Men's Society was started on the South Side, the Danes around Hirsch and Campbell Avenues started the West Side Danish Hundred Men's Society. The board has the following members: C. Hanse, president; Sophus Petersen, vice-president; Hans Scott, financial secretary; C. Madsen, treasurer; and C. Gechler, recording secretary.
